mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( user_id, name, age, sex, identity_card, phone, address, dad_phone, family_address, unit_id, birthday, medicare_disease_code, medical_insurance_id, medical_doctor_number, in_hospital_count ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{identityCard}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{dadPhone}, #{familyAddress}, #{unit.id}, #{birthday}, #{medicareDiseaseCode}, #{medicalInsuranceId}, #{medicalDoctorNumber}, #{inHospitalCount} )
